title: New: Blank Spaces – No Sleep
content:
It’s been a while since we last checked in with Blank Spaces, and he’s certainly been munching on the fruit from the good old tree that is classic pop hits.

New track No Sleep is an “indie music eat your heart out” gem, complete with contagious chorus and singalong vocals. For some bizarre reason I’m reminded of Franz Ferdinand circa third record, with it’s disco sensibilities and dancefloor longing. Check it out below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
